title: Roohi
short_cast: Rajkummar Rao, Varun Sharma, Janhvi Kapoor, Manav Vij, Sarita Joshi, Anurag Arora, Alexx O'Nell, Rajesh Jais

desc: Hired to kidnap a bride, two bumbling pals face a wacky predicament when one falls for their abductee — and the other, for the spirit possessing her.
